entry.source: {F812}Dantalian\0{F87A,0}{F813,0,350501}Hahaha... Only a demon can grant a{F801}human's greedy desire for knowledge.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,350502}Those who seek to learn shall become{F801}nourishment for me, and in turn have{F801}their wishes granted.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Dantalian\0{F87A,0}{F813,0,350501}Hahaha... Only a demon can grant a{F801}human's greedy desire for knowledge.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,350502}Those who seek to learn shall become{F801}nourishment for me, and in turn have{F801}their wishes granted.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Dantalian's face suddenly turned{F801}into the baker's!{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Dantalian's face suddenly turned{F801}into the baker's!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Baker\0{F87A,0}{F813,0,350503}P-Please! Stop, master Samurai!{F801}{F802}{F813,0,350504}I just wanted to know what the{F801}Luxurors are hiding from us!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Baker\0{F87A,0}{F813,0,350503}P-Please! Stop, master Samurai!{F801}{F802}{F813,0,350504}I just wanted to know what the{F801}Luxurors are hiding from us!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Dantalian\0{F87A,0}{F813,0,350507}HAHAHAHA. This is far too amusing.{F801}You shall die cursing your own{F801}foolishness.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Dantalian\0{F87A,0}{F813,0,350507}HAHAHAHA. This is far too amusing.{F801}You shall die cursing your own{F801}foolishness.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Dantalian\0{F87A,0}{F813,0,350508}Impossible! Me, with my infinite{F801}knowledge... defeated by a mere{F801}human? ...How...?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Dantalian\0{F87A,0}{F813,0,350508}Impossible! Me, with my infinite{F801}knowledge... defeated by a mere{F801}human? ...How...?{F801}
